This tutorial will manipulate the surveys data.
It will remove NA values, generate plots, manipulate a selected column of data, and generate an lm.


```{r, eval=FALSE}
#install.packages("googlesheets4")
library(googlesheets4)
googlesheets4::gs4_deauth()
surveys <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PXMHBXOe_L0GZV_qeJWMZEXgxMWJ_BdxIHlTBKYhzMc/edit?usp=sharing")
```
